question.title: Is there a way to add database and schema name dynamically in @query in spring boot repository level
question.body:
I have multiple schemas and in application.properties file I have mentioned one schema name.

But I have a repository which has the query in which I am querying table in different schema. I am passing the db and schema name as a parameter to method.

@Query(value="select * from :db.:schema.Customer",nativeQuery=true)
List<Entity> fetchEntities(@param("db") String db, @Param("schema") String schema);

But this is not working. Any help is appreciated.
